flag.fluidsub

Some helpful tools for fluid substitution.

See Gassman (1951) and Smith, Sondergeld, and Rai (2003) for more information on theory and practice, respectively.

flag.fluidsub.fluidsub(Ks: FVec, K0: FVec, Kfl: FVec, phi: FVec)

Isotropic fluid subsitution using low-frequency Gassman (1951) theory.

Parameters:

  • Ks (TFVec) – Bulk modulus of rock frame [GPa]

  • K0 (TFVec) – Bulk modulus of mineral matrix [GPa]

  • Kfl (TFVec) – Bulk modulus of pore fluid [GPa]

  • phi (TFVec) – Porosity

Returns:

Saturated bulk modulus

Return type:

TFVec

flag.fluidsub.reuss_average(K: FVec, S: FVec)

Reuss (isostress) average.

Parameters:

  • K (TFVec) – Quantity to average.

  • S (TFVec) – Averaging weights for each quantity.

Returns:

Reuss average of K vector

Return type:

TFVec

flag.fluidsub.voigt_average(K: FVec, S: FVec)

Voigt (isostrain) average.

Parameters:

  • K (TFVec) – Quantity to average.

  • S (TFVec) – Averaging weights for each quantity.

Returns:

Voigt average of K vector

Return type:

TFVec

flag.fluidsub.vrh_average(K: FVec, S: FVec)

Voigt-Reuss-Hill average.

Parameters:

  • K (TFVec) – Quantity to average.

  • S (TFVec) – Averaging weights for each quantity.

Returns:

Voigt-Reuss-Hill average of K vector

Return type:

TFVec
